article_plan:
# Review of Vax Air Stretch Upright Vacuum Cleaner

## Introduction
In this article, we will be reviewing the Vax Air Stretch Upright Vacuum Cleaner. This vacuum cleaner boasts an impressive reach of over 17m, powerful multi-cyclonic technology with no loss of suction, and a lightweight design. We will take a closer look at its features, performance, and overall value for money.

## Key Features
- Over 17m reach
- Powerful multi-cyclonic technology
- No loss of suction
- Lightweight design
- Silver and orange color
- 820W power

## Design and Build Quality
We will examine the design and build quality of the Vax Air Stretch Upright Vacuum Cleaner, including its color scheme, materials used, and overall construction.

## Performance
We will test the performance of the vacuum cleaner, including its suction power, ability to pick up dirt and debris on different surfaces, and ease of use.

## User-Friendly Features
We will explore the user-friendly features of the Vax Air Stretch Upright Vacuum Cleaner, such as its cord length, dust capacity, and attachments.

## Pros and Cons
We will outline the pros and cons of the Vax Air Stretch Upright Vacuum Cleaner based on our review and testing.

## Conclusion
In the conclusion, we will summarize our findings and give our overall recommendation for the Vax Air Stretch Upright Vacuum Cleaner.
